topics.title: GraphQL CRUD Operations Recipe
topics.read_when: BEFORE any data operations - ONLY source for GraphQL patterns
warnings: NEVER use inventory patterns for data operations!
Always use MCP to get schema names first (list_schemas, get_schema_details)
Use _id field for filtering, NOT ItemId
Query fields: Schema name + 's' (TodoTask → TodoTasks)
Mutations: operation + schema name (insertTodoTask)
NEVER use Apollo Client - use graphqlClient from lib/graphql-client
Response has no 'data' wrapper - access result.SchemaNames.items directly

topics.title: Confirmation Modal Patterns Recipe
topics.read_when: When implementing delete or destructive actions
warnings: ALWAYS use ConfirmationModal component
Never create custom confirmation dialogs
Never use browser confirm() or AlertDialog

topics.title: React Hook Form Integration Recipe
warnings: Always use React Hook Form with Zod validation
Use Form components from UI layer
Don't mix different form libraries

topics.title: IAM-to-Business-Data Mapping Recipe
topics.read_when: MANDATORY for multi-user apps - bridges IAM users to business data
warnings: Filter at service layer NOT component layer
Always validate business record ownership
Auto-provision business records on first login
Use email as primary bridge between IAM and business data

topics.title: Permissions and Roles Recipe
topics.read_when: MANDATORY for multi-user apps - MUST create roles via MCP first
warnings: MUST use MCP to create roles FIRST before implementing
Application-level security only (not server-side)
Use useUserRole() hook for permission checks
Filter data at service layer based on roles
Default to least privilege (USER role) on errors
